room_title: Escape room "The Royal Heist" by EscapeXperience Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
room_description: You are a member of a successful crime syndicate, and your specialty has always been safecracking. Today, you will be facing your greatest challenge yet, as you and your team attempt a heist at the Royal Treasure. The security system has been deactivated for an hour, and all the tools are in place for your mission. If you do manage to enter the vault, you will have to make a crucial decision: take the available money and run or stay just a little longer to try to significantly increase your take and steal the royal crown!
